document_data.name: Aravele
document_data.mainbody: '''Aravele''' was a mercenary that lived in [[Phlan]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Secrets of Sokol Keep|8}}
document_data.Relationships: She was known to be freinds with a fellow mercenary named [[Keria]] and [[Grim Thornbuck|Grim]], a guardsman and member of the [[Black Fist]].
document_data.History:
During the 1480s [[DR]],{{ToD-time}} various problems began to arise in Phlan, and the beacon over [[Sokol Keep]] went out.{{Cite adventurers league/Secrets of Sokol Keep|7}} Both the city's Black Fist guardsman and the local dockworkers blamed each other for the emergent problem. Some members of the Black Fist, including Keria's friend Grim went missing.

One night when having drinks at the [[Laughing Goblin Inn]], Aravele and Keria got into a heated argument with a group of Phlan's dockworkers.
